column4: hi people, anybody managed to install inkscape 0.47 under xubuntu 9.4?
try installing from the package manager?
it isnt offer, i downloaded inkscape_0.47-0ubuntu1_i386.deb but i get an error : libglibmm-2.4-1c2a (>= 2.22.0)
inkscape is in the repos, you might have to add multiverse or universe
